name: Whiplash Merchandising Inc.
description: Developer of an e-commerce software designed to offer order management and warehouse management services. The company's e-commerce software offers integration, order management system (OMS) as well as warehouse management system (WMS) capabilities to emerging brands along with real-time visibility and OMS capabilities, labor management and order fulfillment services, enabling companies to enhance their operations with expanded customer offerings and responsiveness.
one_liner: Developer of an e-commerce software designed to offer order management and warehouse management services.
